name: Deconstructing Financial Warfare Strategies
description: Training in identifying, analyzing, and counteracting financial warfare tactics used by global power structures.

cards.title: Understanding Economic Manipulation
cards.description: Recognizing patterns of financial warfare in national and global economies.
bulletpoints: Identifying currency devaluation tactics.
Understanding controlled inflation and deflation cycles.
Recognizing trade wars and economic sanctions as tools of control.

cards.title: Central Banking & Debt Enslavement
cards.description: Analyzing how central banks manipulate economies through interest rates and fiat currency control.
bulletpoints: Understanding how the Federal Reserve and IMF operate.
Tracing the impact of fractional reserve banking.
Recognizing how national debt is used to control governments.

cards.title: Stock Market Engineering
cards.description: Identifying artificial market manipulations by hedge funds and institutional investors.
bulletpoints: Recognizing pump-and-dump schemes and naked short selling.
Tracing insider trading and regulatory capture.
Understanding the role of high-frequency trading (HFT) in market control.

cards.title: Cryptocurrency Disruption & Digital Finance
cards.description: Exploring how blockchain and decentralized finance (DeFi) challenge traditional banking systems.
bulletpoints: Analyzing government efforts to regulate or suppress crypto adoption.
Understanding the risks of centralized digital currencies (CBDCs).
Leveraging privacy coins and decentralized exchanges for financial independence.

cards.title: Corporate Monopoly & Resource Hoarding
cards.description: Investigating how global corporations control markets and suppress competition.
bulletpoints: Identifying monopolistic business practices.
Recognizing price-fixing, regulatory capture, and resource hoarding.
Understanding how corporations influence policy through lobbying.

cards.title: Elite Money Laundering & Shadow Banking
cards.description: Tracking hidden financial networks used by elites for tax evasion and covert funding.
bulletpoints: Understanding offshore accounts and shell corporations.
Identifying money laundering tactics through legal entities.
Tracing illicit capital flows through shadow banking systems.

cards.title: Weaponized Inflation & Hyperinflation Scenarios
cards.description: Analyzing how economic collapses are engineered through monetary policy.
bulletpoints: Recognizing the signs of hyperinflation before economic collapse.
Understanding how food, energy, and essential goods are used as economic weapons.
Developing resilience strategies for surviving financial destabilization.

cards.title: Economic Warfare Tactics & Countermeasures
cards.description: Developing strategies to protect assets and resist financial control.
bulletpoints: Understanding asset diversification and alternative stores of value.
Leveraging barter economies and community trade networks.
Building financial independence through strategic investments.

cards.title: AI & Algorithmic Market Manipulation
cards.description: Investigating the role of AI in financial warfare and economic control.
bulletpoints: Understanding how AI-driven trading algorithms manipulate markets.
Tracing predictive analytics used in economic forecasting.
Recognizing algorithmic suppression of certain market trends.

cards.title: Building Parallel Financial Systems
cards.description: Establishing alternative economic systems to resist centralized financial control.
bulletpoints: Exploring local and decentralized currency models.
Developing self-sustaining trade networks and barter systems.
Utilizing precious metals, commodities, and digital assets as alternative stores of value.
